UsageVolumeProduct.description: A bucket (called UsageVolumeProduct in the SID model) represents a quantity of usage, as 2 hours national calls or 50 sms for example. It could be either a quantity or an amount in a currency (i.e. It could represent a fixed number of SMS, MMS, minutes of calls, quantity of data, number of events as well as a specific amount in a given currency). It requires one or more network products from which usages will debit the bucket.

isShared.description: True if the bucket is shared between several devices or users

usageType.description: Type of usage concerned by the bucket, such as voice, sms, data
